TopicTitle: A Kerbal's Guide to our solar system

Articles.Content:
To bad my pc can\'t Handel the graphics

Can\'t Handel it huh? I understand. Mine just about Baroque when I tried to fly some of my larger designs. It can barely opera-ate in the best of times.

I forgot to mention, I added some dwarf planets and updated some info the other day (Including a hypothetical secondary moon for kerbin)

Edit: also added surface gravity values
HarvesteR needs to look at this. 8)

HarvesteR needs to look at this. 8)

He already has.

He already has.

I\'m such a fail. =P
I\'d like a solar system like the one in spore.. (almost endless)

I\'d like a solar system like the one in spore.. (almost endless)

An endless solar system eh? Wow, that a damn big solar system.

An endless solar system eh? Wow, that a damn big solar system.

I\'m even playing Spore, and it think you mean that they should add a whole galaxy.

This is mostly unreal, but I support the idea and think that it will be implemented in version 0.30 and higher.
This looks awesome! Do you have a general idea of when this will be available to download?

I\'d like a solar system like the one in spore.. (almost endless)

Ah....Spore....I remember playing that game all thet time.

If I hadn\'t installed the expansions in the wrong order, and thereby glitching it up for good, i\'d still be playing it. :\'(

I forgot to mention, I added some dwarf planets and updated some info the other day (Including a hypothetical secondary moon for kerbin)

Edit: also added surface gravity values

Can you add rouge moons? The ones that are only really asteroids that occasionally get caught in a planets gravity for a moment or two. Then they just fly off again. ;D

Can you add rouge moons? The ones that are only really asteroids that occasionally get caught in a planets gravity for a moment or two. Then they just fly off again. ;D

Why do they have to be rouge... couldn\'t they be blue, or gray or black? (sorry, couldn\'t resist... used to be a rogue player in wow... always was a pet peeve of mine.)

Has anyone tried making this in Universe Sandbox to see if the physics of this solar system actually works? I did it and then added the first 3 planets and the gravity from Eve caused Kerbins orbit to turn elliptical.
You need to place it further away, then or adjust the gravity. In real life, it\'s clear that we\'re not the only planet in the solar system.

Why do they have to be rouge... couldn\'t they be blue, or gray or black? (sorry, couldn\'t resist... used to be a rogue player in wow... always was a pet peeve of mine.)

I hate my dyslexia. Just try living with this brain. It\'s so confusing.
So is Minmus the renamed Rupa?

So is Minmus the renamed Rupa?

Heh, it would seem so. Let me edit the chart to reflect that.

Edit: Also, changed some of the names to fit with the old world kerbal language I\'m developing.
Aww... Where\'s the pretty pictures?

Really amazing ideas, Nova!

Just waiting for more sexy Space Engine screenshots of our new system......

BTW Ralph and Ralph Jr. are my favorites
Hey, Nova, what\'s about 3d\'s max render? I think it can look much better if it was made in 3ds max or Blender. My first try of landscape render - Eve, looks like KSP graphics 8)

Wow! This made me super excited about the full release of KSP !!!

I have a plan of what I will do when the full version is released:

Step 1: Blow all of the beginners money on searching for a gas giant.

Step 2: Name It Mandrake OR If it\'s green, name it Greenvine.

Step 3: Make a rocket that has enough fuel to reach Mandrake/Greenvine.

Step 4: On top of the rocket, will be a little plane that will fly in the atmosphere of the gas giant.

Step 5: After a few flights to Mandrake/Greenvine, Build a space station in orbit around it.

Step 6: If elements (Hydrogen, Methane, Noble Gases, Ect.) are added, Build a mining facility and start building orbital launch pads.

*Patriotic Music Start*

And After that, Children in schools will sing songs about the expiditions and the brave astronauts from /insert nation here/ will be remembered forever!

LONG LIVE /insert nation here/!!!

*Patriotic Music End*

So, yeah. That\'s my plan!

*Sorry if this seems off-topic. I thought it would fit :/.
okay, now that Silisko is part of the dev team now, the probability that this solar system will be implemented is almost 1

okay, now that Silisko is part of the dev team now, the probability that this solar system will be implemented is almost 1

No, him being a part of the dev team does NOT increase chances for that. It does however, improve the speed and overall quality of the update.

I am certain that Harvester already has a virtually complete plan for the default system by now. How close it is to this one and how much it will change i cannot say though.

I\'m sure that whatever it is will be at least as good as Silisko\'s.
Nova IS part of the team now. You never know.
